question.body: Which of the following is not a cell of the myocardium?

response.feedback: Incorrect. Pacemaker cells, also called nodal cells, allow the heart to produce its own beat.
Correct. Keratinized cells would be located in the epidermis of your skin where they have a protective function.
Incorrect. Conducting cells of the heart carry the action potential from the SA to the AV node and from the AV node to the rest of the heart.
Incorrect. The myocardial cells are cardiac muscle cells that allow the heart to beat as one unit.
